No Fillers Music Awards

Visual & UI Design, Front-End Development

Lead designer for the No Fillers Music Awards 2013. The project featured rising indie, hip/hop and electornic artists in 2013 and consisted of fourteen articles released over the course of five days. Had to quickly create and iterate and often designed in code. Responsible for UI design, visual asset creation/delegation, and styling in HTML and CSS. Worked directly with stakeholders and developers to ensure designs met the audience's needs and were executable.

View the live experience here.
